info.title: Translo API
info.description: Translation and language detection API. Supports automatic language detection and translation between multiple languages. Provides fast and accurate text translation with auto-detect source language capability.

get.description: Translates text from source language to target language. Supports automatic source language detection by setting source_lang to 'auto'. Returns translated text with detected or specified source language.

parameters.name: source_lang
parameters.description: Source language code or 'auto' for automatic detection, e.g.: 'en', 'es', 'fr', 'de', 'auto'

get.description: Automatically detects the language of provided text. Returns detected language code and confidence score. Useful for identifying unknown languages before translation.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: Text to detect language from, e.g.: 'Hello, world!' or any text in unknown language
